Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The hotel is in a bustling neighborhood with many shops and restaurants Although this is one of the quietest streets you will occasionally hear happy and loud tourists yelling on the street
Positive_Review: Completely charming romantic hotel with history Comfortable lobby stone walls wood beams excellent continental breakfast very friendly and helpful staff I suggest going at least one level up in room from the standard Worth the extra money My room had an ultra high ceiling with wooden beams so spacious feeling for the size I have also stayed in the larger executive rooms and they are amazing My chamber had a beautiful tall window where I could peer out on the street with black out drapes if you need a nap AC that regulated the room well to a good temperature and beautiful decoration with a nice marble bathroom The hotel is situated in one of the liveliest neighborhoods in Paris directly off the RER B from CDG I highly recommend this hotel I have stayed multiple times and plan to return many more Try a walk along the Seine from Notre Dame to the Eiffel Tower In the past few years barges and beer garden style outdoor restaurants have multiplied along this route Greats runs are possible along the Seine If you wake in the middle of the night the nearby piano bar Aux Trois Maillettes is open until 5 am and the even closer cafe Le Depart St Michel a few tables have a Notre Dame view is open 24 hours The hop on hop off Seine tour boat Batobus has a stop nearby you are feet from the metro and RER right next to Notre Dame the Louvre and Luxembourg Gardens and between the Latin Quarter and St Germaine Location location location

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: A little noisy but then it is Paris
Positive_Review: Great location Easy walking distance to Norte Dame great restaurants Musee D Orsay Lourve hop on hop of bus

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Beautiful classic hotel very home alike the staff Henri is one of the kindest and heart warming person I have ever met in Paris I love the decoration on the wall going to order this hotel again next time I come to Paris and which all the member in this hotel have a nice day

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Small rooms like most of the rooms in Paris Maybe add some eggs for breakfast
Positive_Review: Amazing hotel Great location close to many bars and restaurants Henry was very kind and helpful His advice and recommendations were great and he made sure we will feel at home

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Day managers Henri and Alain were each in their own way excellent hosts They were helpful at times beyond expectation I was delighted as well to view the photographs from the Relais Hotel du Vieux Paris life as The Beat Hotel they brought great memories of my teenage years when it felt subversive to go to an Alan Ginsberg or Lawrence Ferlinghetti poetry reading wonderful

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Hard to find much wrong other than decor is a bit tired and breakfast options are limited Plenty of cafes nearby
Positive_Review: Perfect location minutes from Notre Dam and Latin Quarter Surprisingly cool room for an old hotel on a v hot day Very personal and friendly service A charming historic cosy hotel Good showers Decent wifi Easy access to Roland Garos via Metro line 10 from Odeon

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Not sure if didn t like is the right term the rooms are decorated over the top which we found quite quirky and a good experience Others may find it a bit in the face
Positive_Review: Convenient to all we wanted to experience in Paris Friendly and helpful staff nothing was too much trouble

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Henri and his entire staff were exceptionally attentive very kind and helpful my daughter and I were upgraded to a deluxe twin room with a queen sized bed original wooden beams on the walls and ceiling and a quintessential blue toile pattern on the walls and fine European linens There was a wonderful bathroom with shower and tub and a small sitting area where we could enjoy a glass of wine at the end of the day It was stunningly beautiful The hotel is about 400 feet from Notre Dame and several wonderful brasseries and a Metro stop are right there as well The Louvre Touilleries and Place de Carroussell are also five minute walks Tres bien Henri and merci millefois

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Excellent location of the hotel in a quiet street near the center of Paris and the metro Very friendly staff The design of the hotel is impressive

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Hotel was poor Cramped Small rooms Little communal facilities and no even small bar Staff intrusive and overbearing Very very poor value for money Unsure how it received such good ratings from booking Com The experience has now put me off using g your website again as I can t trust the ratings This really was NOT A four star hotel
Positive_Review: Bed was reasonably comfortable

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Excellent staff very attentive and always willing to help Rooms very comfortable breadfast very good Location excellent Metro close Excellent restaurants and shopping only a short walk

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: This is a very cosy hotel optimally located for business or leisure travel to Paris since it is very close to metro and RER lines There are many nice restaurants around and main sights are at walking distance The staff is friendly and street quiet despite being so close to the Seine quais

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Lift was a bit small But hey there s a lift You don t always get one in French hotels
Positive_Review: This hotel is superbly located in walking distance of the Louvre and Notre Dame and the River Cruises Easy to walk to metro for further afield in Paris It s very clean and comfy Room has safe and minibar and nice toiletries Good shower It s stylish Henri very helpful with directions tips English and charming manners Breakfast very good with pastries eggs yogurt juice cheese fruit salad as well as usual bread and coffee The other staff were kind and helpful We loved it here and will definitely return

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Right from the moment we checked in and met Henry at the reception it was a smooth process Everything was perfect with central location and public transport close by Hotel arranged for pick up n drop taxi facilities The boat ride recommended by Henri was superb

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Room did not match pictures electric heater only source of heating and was off shower room was impossibly small common room and reception very pretty and clean but far too small
Positive_Review: Great location clean hotel good breakfast friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Localization is very good close to most interesting places as the Eiffel tower Musee du Louvre or Notre Dame and more Very close to metro males it very easy to go every where in Paris The hotel is very nice woth few rooms and nice staff especially Henri who was very patient with us and gave us good advice Breakfast was fresh and enough servedy the table The room was maybe small but nice No noice was disturbing us Really nice and good hotel

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Typical 3 star hotel in central Paris tiny some would say cosy no additional facilities old furniture not too comfy a bed But convenient location very friendly gentleman at the desk and reasonable price did convince me that I should book there again

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: great parisian small hotel perfect location good breakfast the staff was very helpful the room was small yet we didnt care we were out all day The room was very quit although facing the street

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: The hotel was small and quaint the breakfast made to order in a very cute dining area Whenever we asked for information we got it They made dinner reservations at very close great French places

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The elevator is a bit small and slow
Positive_Review: Excellent location and a very lovely boutique hotel Very nice and helpful staff and more than excellent value for money Slept excellent since it was very quiet and well placed in a not so quiet but exciting Quartier Latin Close to many great monuments and exiting places

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Small rooms but that s Paris
Positive_Review: Great location walking distance to all major sites and tons of restaurants and bars nearby Very cute property with comfy beds nice bathrooms

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Room v small elevator is minute Heard loud noise in the morning that woke me up probably they were fixing something on the floor above hitting something by a hammer No kettle in room
Positive_Review: Location Friendly receptionist on check in Cleanliness

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Only had two days but we are going back in a month
Positive_Review: The staff were absolutely fantastic Henri was not only incredibly helpful he recommended a perfect restaurant 5 mins from the hotel but also very amusing and charming The location was perfect we walked everywhere Surrounded by amazing boutiques restaurants theatres Jardin de Luxembourg The breakfast room was very quaint and the food delicious eggs cooked to order fruit cereals pastries baguette cheese a feast It was more like staying with friends in a beautiful home than a hotel in a big city

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Having to leave after 2 nights we ll be back
Positive_Review: No need to say anymore on the location We were in room 56 on the top floor which is very quiet and very cosy Very good new bed 180 cm which is often not the case in French hotels Cute room with a small mezzanine nice antique furniture The decoration of this room is plain no colorful wallpapers which is the way we prefer it Although the renaissance wallpapers fit the 15th century house very well 15 Breakfast is good value for money if you don t only want a coffee and one croissant Lots of fresh bread and pastry cereal and joghurt and a choice of eggs ham and cheese Mr Henri will be happy to help with any advice action or restaurant reservation you need If you just need a glass of wine and a little tapas try La grande cremerie a couple of streets away run be a French Californian The night portier is very friendly and helpful too Offers you a free coffee and madeleine if you have to leave at 6 a m as we did

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: The location was perfect for exploring this area within walking distance of le de la Cit with Notre Dame etc Breakfast was very good fresh orange juice and pastries Our room was lovely walls lined with fabric in beautiful colours Staff were approachable very friendly and helpful with directions and ideas for restaurants thank you Henri

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The bed mattress didn t suit my partner Pierre And the photos of my preferred room were photos only in my mind I had waited 9 mths for that romantic room and it went to someone else
Positive_Review: Henri was marvellous with many tips for great restaurants best ways to see Paris Everything was possible nothing was too much trouble He is a gem

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: The staff especially Henri were very helpful and friendly Breakfast was excellent and good value The decor was beautiful and our room very spacious

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The bed could do with a topper The breakfast was delicious and very good value but the area breakfast was served in was too tiny to offer a reasonable atmosphere it would almost be better to put one table and lots of chairs around it encourage travellers to share
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful and friendly definately going the extra mile and seemed genuinely focused on making sure their patrons had the best possible time The hotel is stuffed with gentle aristocratic charm and very elegant in a very unpresumptious way Fantastic quiet location so close to the centre

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Lack of drawers for clothes in the traditional room we booked the smallest room in the hotel
Positive_Review: Henry the manager I s most helpful and very friendly Room and bathroom are comfy and clean Location is perfect for RER b and sightseeing on foot

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: We didn t try breakfast because at E15 per person we thought it was a bit expensive Lots of little cafes a short stroll away for a coffee and croissant
Positive_Review: Lovely boutique hotel in the Latin Quarter about ten minutes walk from Notre Dam Very near the metro station so easy to get to it The staff were pleasant and helpful When we visit Paris again we would be very happy to book this hotel

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: This hotel is the quaint Paris experience we were looking for Henri is right out of central casting for a Parisian hotelier and was incredibly helpful It is located right in the middle of everything and has easy access to the metro Staying at this hotel made for the actual Paris experience we were hoping for when we made our plans A quaint hotel with modern conveniences

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Watch out that the breakfast price does NOT include taxes which add a bit to the cost Also at check out was not able to pay by credit card in Euro so had to pay cash to avoid a very poor automatic exchange rate
Positive_Review: great location very helpful staff good value for money

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: It would have been nice to have been able to get just a cup of tea in the afternoon or in our room Breakfast was a bit more than we needed or wanted to pay since one croissant an espresso was all we needed
Positive_Review: Henri at the front desk was very friendly helpful The beds were comfy the rooms were perfectly cleaned each day Location was the best

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Cannot find fault with this wonderful old hotel
Positive_Review: We have stayed here before and will again The location is fantastic whether going to and from the Airport CdeG spending time watching activity in the left bank area or using the metro to get around Paris The staff are fantastic and very helpful Rooms are beautifully decorated and furnished in period style

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Only thing was that it is a little bit noisy at night but that is Paris
Positive_Review: Lovely old hotel in a superb location but the very best thing about staying here is how lovely all the staff are sometimes a rarity in Paris Lovely breakfast Spacious room with charming decor

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: All of the staff were amazing friendly and very helpful with securing museum passes helping us with train booking and general information The hotel was so conveniently located 1 2 block from the Seine right across from the Ile de la Cite on the left bank We could walk to everything If you didn t want to walk the metro stop was a half block away There were copies of the International NYTimes in the lobby every day The Vieux Paris is a small more personal hotel which is what we like I would definitely recommend it to anyone staying in Paris and wouldn t hesitate to stay there again myself

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: If the elevator had been larger it would have been appreciated However given the age of the building even a small elevator may be a miracle
Positive_Review: We found that the staff was superior in the help that they provided They were friendly courteous knowledgeable and willing to spend extra time making sure that our needs were met The location of the hotel is superb

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Only downside was some banging noises in the morning and construction outside but we still had long sleeps in the morning despite the mild inconvenience Rooms are small but that is Paris Sliding door into bathroom didn t allow full privacy but ok for a couple
Positive_Review: Had a fab stay excellent location and staff were so friendly and laid back especially Henri may have got the wrong name he was such a friendly man Had a great stay We didn t have breakfast but it sounded fab and good value I will be back PS great little restaurant beside the hotel called Le Lutin sans Le garden It was amazing and recommended by the hotel

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Super location and service Lovely rooms Henri the manager was absolutely delightful and extremely helpful with reservations and recomendations Quiet street in historic Paris

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Our second stay at Vieux Paris Wonderful hotel great location beautiful room extremely friendly staff what s not to like Next time in Paris we know where to stay

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: This is a great little hotel We stayed there May 18 25 this year and will stay there again the next time we are in Paris Staff is very helpful and speaks English They have tickets to the major museums at a small premium which eliminates need to stand in at least one line Our room was small but comfortable and the bathroom was modern and hotel and location are quiet But best aspect is fabulous location only one block from the Place St Michel in the heart of the left bank Easy walking distance to most of the major sights and very close to Metro

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Sadly breakfast looked awfully poor so I went out to get some The proximity of the Canadian Pub and the Irish Pub on each side of the little street means that on weekends it can get rowdy
Positive_Review: Super outstanding location Room decently sized for Paris housekeeping very good staff quite lovely

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Location One cannot wish more 5 min walk to Norte Dame about 10 to Louvre Interiors are very interesting on my opinion our room had a wonderful combination of wall textile and dark wood Comfy room friendly staff everything was very nice

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: A little expensive unfortunate building works close by
Positive_Review: Great location bed very comfortable staff very friendly and helpful Would be happy to re visit on another occasion

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Lovely bedroom gorgeous wallpaper so very French Also very friendly staff and owners super handy location between St Germain and the le

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Incredible location close to every landmark and bars and restaurants on your doorstep The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful A beautiful boutique hotel

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: If anything the fact that the door to the bathroom didn t shut properly so it was a bit intimate But no worries we have been married for 49 years
Positive_Review: Yes the croissants were extra flaky and the breakfast was excellent The bed was wonderful

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Only thing was the tiny elevator but we managed
Positive_Review: Friendly helpful staff thank you Henri Very central location especially with first time visitors to Paris Darling newly refreshed rooms Interesting historical building

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Disadvantages Very small rooms Breakfast selection is very poor only drinks and some pastry
Positive_Review: Advantages Location within walking distance from Notre Dame De Paris and Louvre Numerous restaurants around Close to subway Friendly staff providing helpful advice to tourists

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The bathroom door did not complete shut The hair dryer is ancient a Hoover on the wall job with very little blow
Positive_Review: Location was fantastic Room was very quiet and tastefully decorated

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: The location was excellent extremely close to the Seine the Metro RER and Notre Dame The staff were courteous helpful with recommendations including a vegetarian restaurant that was a few minutes walk away and spoke English which was my biggest worry The rate was affordable and the room suited our needs rarely in the room anyway

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The other front desk staff member was not particularly friendly
Positive_Review: Room was great and the breakfast was great One of the front desk staff was extremely helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: There is no breakfast buffet and breakfast is rather simple consisting of coffee tea or chocolate fruit salad joghurt 1 glass of orange juice half a baguette 1 croissant and 1 chocolate croissant cereals 3 different types of packed cheeses and various jams If you ask you can have a boiled egg Ham or sausages are not served What surprised me a bit was the attitude of the receptionist When I checked out I wanted to buy a metro ticket which normally costs 10 Euros and he wanted to have 11 for it When I told him that the price is 10 he replied Well 10 or 11 Euros what is the big deal for you After I told him that I will buy the ticket at the station he sold it to me for 10 Euros nonetheless This left a sour smack that the staff tries to screw up guests on an otherwise positive impression of the hotel
Positive_Review: The rooms are very nice provided that one likes sort of antique rooms The rooms are nicely decorated clean and have a nice flair The room rate was 199 which is high for what is offered but it seems normal hotels of this category in St Germain Breakfast is served from 8 12 o clock The breakfast room is rather small but nice The hotel is located next to St Michel Metro station which offers a very good and cheap connection to the airport Charles deGaulle

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: This small hotel is full of character Ask for the book about it s history Rooms are small but have everything you need the shower even had Jacuzzi jets The hotel is just south of the river from Notre Dame It is convenient to the metro However much of Paris is within walking distance The nearby street St Andre des Artes has almost every choice of eating places you can imagine The manager and his staff did everything they could to ensure we enjoyed our stay

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The people working at the reception are by far the slowest clerks I have come across Nothing was digitalized and they made mistakes constantly We left for meetings twice and came late because of reception taking too long with customers One couple had to check out before us which we had to wait for 20 minutes for and our check out took 20 25 minutes It felt like Fawlty Towers and for this reason I cannot recommend the hotel if you don t like waiting for what seems to be no reason
Positive_Review: Great location and very nice rooms

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The lift is very small but we didn t mind You can only fit two people inside and is a squeeze if you have lots of luggage
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and always willing to help us advising us of places to visit and assisting with travel arrangements The local area is lovely with lots of cafes restaurants and shops The river Notre dame and a tube station a few minutes walk away We visited all the main attractions using the metro we never travelled for more than 20 minutes so this is an ideal location The room was small but fine for the two of us and had always been cleaned when we got back in the evening

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Excellent location Close to St Michel and handily placed to explore Paris by foot or metro but quiet Our 2nd visit to this boutique hotel Helpful staff and a very good breakfast

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The room itself was a bit cramped The chairs were scary to sit on We felt that these items might unexpectedly collapse at any moment
Positive_Review: Staff desk and chamber tried to help in every way they could It was clean Breakfast was fine

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Location is very central to major Paris sights Staff are welcoming friendly and helpful Room was compact but comfortable had everything necessary for a few days in Paris A great base from which to enjoy Paris

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The room we were allocated was quite inadequate We had asked in advance for the same room as we had stayed in previously but despite the hotel being very quiet were told it was not available The room we were given was small at the back of the hotel with a shower toilet room only separated from the bedroom by a flimsy sliding door We do not believe that can be acceptable in a not inexpensive 4 Star Hotel During our stay work commenced stripping the wooden floors throughout the ground floor including the breakfast room using a noisy smelly industrial size machine so that work continued around us without any explanation or apology We were very disappointed We will not stay at this hotel again
Positive_Review: The Location at St Michel on the Left Bank is very good for reaching most parts of Paris The hotel is in a very old property with considerable character We ve stayed there before and enjoyed it

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: the room with its authentic beams made one feel part of old Paris Friendly staff Chopard toiletries excellent location near St Michel RER Metro Buses

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The pub was too close so too easy to drink too much haha
Positive_Review: The Staff were delightful and spoke slow french so I could understand They were overly helpful and even upgraded us The location is perfect the seine to one side and the small cobble locked streets of st michel to the other The decor was beautiful relaxed like an old wooden cottage in the middle of nowhere Incredible Home in the middle of Paris

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Location was excellent Very proximate to the metro a short walk to Notre Dame and the river cruises Friendly staff Henri was friendly and very helpful with advice Lovely room

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: We did not purchase the breakfast package too expensive at 15 per person
Positive_Review: The was a beautifil place to stay loved my room The staff very friendly and helpful with attractions to visit could even sell tickets to many placrs

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The room was clean had everything we needed The wallpaper was a bit extravagant for my taste and made me think of Oscar Wilde s famous last words but was charming in its own way The blowdryer in the bathroom is not very good so if you want to dry your hair fast bring your own
Positive_Review: The location was excellent the staff especially Henri was very friendly helpful with restaurants tickets The hotel s history as the Beat writers hotel with photos of Allen Ginsberg William Burroughs in the reception gave the place an added charm for me

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: A charming well located hotel Small rooms as is typical for hotels in Paris especially in the popular tourist areas Some reviews we read online had concerns over cleanliness Our room was clean and nicely Appointed Staff friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Staff was very helpful and accommodating recommending restaurants and helping us with directions They also sell museum tickets at the front desk so you can avoid long ticket lines at the Louvre and Musee d Orsay and sneak right in

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Rooms are small but we were 1 person per room so this wasn t a problem 2 would have been a squeeze in the rooms we were in
Positive_Review: Quiet interior rooms staff made afternoon tea on request ordered taxis and recommended v good local restaurants that weren t touristy

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely helpful in organizing everything that we needed from taxis museum passes and restaurants Took the stress right out of our stay

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Fantastic Location Staff were extremely welcoming and friendly The room was very Boutique and the room was very unique The breakfast in the morning is reasonably priced

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Small bathroom but we understand that is to be expected in Paris But very nice amenities
Positive_Review: Staff was very welcoming Quaint hotel built in 1480 Convenient location

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Minimal breakfast very small rooms room facing street a but noisy until midnight and starting at 6 00 with garbage pick But that is the case with most small boutique hotels
Positive_Review: Location helpful staff near great restaurants and metro station

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Great location to great food and all the sights Room did not have a view but very quaint Henry the night manager was extremely helpful in advising and making reservations for us which truly made our stay eventful

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Lovely staff excellent location easy to get to from CDG Rooms are small but to be expected for Paris we upgraded to the next size up A beautiful quaint hotel

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: The Vieux Paris is a small charming hotel gem located within a few blocks of the St Michel metro the cafes and shops of the Blvd St Germain and just across the Seine from Notre Dame and the delights of the Ile de la Cite and the Ile St Louis Its side street location makes for a very quiet and peaceful night s sleep after which you ll enjoy a delicious breakfast of coffee freshly squeezed orange juice croissants baguettes yogurts and cheese Amiable and knowledgeable Henri will cheerfully greet you and help with any recommendations or reservations you require This was our 2nd stay at Vieux Paris and will not be our last

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Great location The staff Immaculately clean Henri is someone very special no question is too hard and he is fantastic at showcasing this beautiful city without fuss and always with a smile

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: fantastic location near Notre Dame yet tucked away in a quiet street Very characterful and cosy hotel But note the lift is tiny and the staircase is a tiny spiral staircase so not really suitable for disabled access particularly in case of fire Bathroom very well appointed but compact and again it would be difficult to climb into the shower if mobility restricted

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Good stay However small things like one host at the hotel could be more flexible especially when the client asks for things that are reasonable i e checking total bill one day before departure and small things like this did not like attitude Clients do rule sir especially when they ask things nicely and politely Cleaning lady has to put everyday shower gel etc as these were missing or ad hoc U also need to get out of your room by noon everyday in order for yr room to be done as otherwise cleaning lady is not there afternoons Not a pbm if u know this beforehand very very small lift that does the job though but overweight people with luggage not sure But this goes with how old the building is part of the charm Attention is needed to repaint bottom doors and skirtings to keep the look being great aside from above good stay Love the look of certain rooms Breakfasts in the room were very nice You can ask what you wish Very romantic and the rest of the staff was helpful Would return
Positive_Review: Excellent location and liked the look of my room with beams on the ceiling One of the reason I chose this hotel Top top rooms can be clostrophobic as window only opens from the roof down

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: The staff was really helpful despite our lack of speaking French This hotel was centrally located and within walking distance of everything we wanted to see though we did use the metro because of its convenience The B line goes straight to a stop close to the hotel from the airport and it was easy to use Make sure you get the right B train on the way back to the airport by using the overhead monitor I read where a client thought the room was too small For a city this size and from growing up in NY the room was a little larger than I expected I would highly recommend this hotel It was very cute and the room well appointed and close to Notre Dame and several cafes

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Great location wonderfully helpful staff good price and literary history to boot We loved this small hotel and will return to it the next time we come to Paris

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Alain and Daniel were extremely helpful and kind Alain made over twenty calls to find a dentist who could help my wife with a crown that fell off on our flight to Paris

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Initial room was smoky eventhough advertised as non smoking room on door and hotel in general but staff quickly relocated us to a non smoking room
Positive_Review: Terrific room Great location Next to Saint Michel Metro RER etc Many walking tours begin less than 5 min away Lots of action nearby at night

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: Asking for 5 Euros deposit for borrowing umbrella to go out in the rain Moreover from hotel guest who is still staying in the hotel and not checked out
Positive_Review: Very clean situated in wonderful location close to everywhere sightseeing shopping cafes and most important in very quite area so you can sleep well

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The air conditioning functioned but not properly and the manager whilst helpful was unable to fix it
Positive_Review: Excellent location Unique architecture Helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Nice little place very convenient for sight seeing

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Wonderful location and beautiful appointed hotel Staff extremely helpful

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Staff was very helpful and friendly Location to all we wanted to do was perfect

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: The location was excellent for walking to Notre Dame the Latin Quarter and sight seeing buses

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: very friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Staff was very friendly and helpful especially Henri

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Negative_Review: The fabric on the walls in our bedroom
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: Very comfortable and peaceful room despite being around the corner from Place St Michel

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: The location is very good just beside Saint Michel

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
Positive_Review: The hotel located closely to metro and RER Helpful staff who speaks excellent english

Hotel_Name: Relais H tel du Vieux Paris
